alert.note: Alert for Keokuk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Keokuk County through 945 AM CDT... At 856 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Delta, or near Sigourney, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding in low lying areas and ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Sigourney, Delta, Hayesville, Lancaster, Yenruogis County Park and Keokuk County Expo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
